info.title: Claims API
info.description:
Manages all claims based resources, including:

* Claims
* Settlements
* Recoveries
* Statements
* Invoices

Requires the following roles to use:

* claims_reader
* claims_writer
* claims_remover

get.description:
Get a paginated list of claims. Can be filtered by scope.

Requires the claims_reader role to access.

post.description:
Create a new claim.

Requires the claim_writer role to access.

get.description:
Fetches a single claim.

Requires the claims_reader role to access.

put.description:
Updates a claim.

Requires the claims_writer role to access.

delete.description:
Delete a claim.

Requires the claims_remover role to access.

get.description:
Get a paginated list of all settlements for a claim.

Requires the claims_reader role to access.

post.description:
Create a new settlement on a claim.

Requires the claims_writer role to access.

get.description:
Fetch a single settlement on a claim.

Requires the claims_reader role to access.

put.description:
Update a settlement on a claim.

Requires the claims_writer role to access.

delete.description:
Delete a settlement from a claim.

Requires the claims_remover role to access.

get.description:
Fetches a paginated list of all recoveries on a claim.

Requires the claims_reader role to access.

post.description:
Create a recovery on a claim.

Requires the claims_writer role to access.

get.description:
Fetch a single recovery on a claim.

Requires the claims_reader role to access.

put.description:
Update a recovery.

Requires the claims_writer role to access.

delete.description:
Delete a recovery from a claim.

Requires the claim_remover role to access.

get.description:
Fetch a paginated list of all statements. Can be searched by lender.

Requires the claims_reader role to access.

post.description:
Create a statement for a lender.

Requires the claims_writer role to access.

get.description:
Fetch a single statement.

Requires the claims_reader role to access.

put.description:
Update a statement.

Requires the claims_writer role to access.

delete.description:
Deletes a statement.

Requires the claims_remover role to access.

get.description:
Get a paginated list of all invoices. Can be filtered by lender id.

Requires the claims_reader role to access.

post.description:
Create an invoice for a given date range.

Requires the claims_writer role to access.

get.description:
Gets a single invoice.

Requires the claims_reader role to access.

put.description:
Update an invoice.

Requires the claims_writer role to access.

delete.description:
Deletes an invoice.

Requires the claims_remover role to access.

get.summary: Get all settlements in an invoice
get.description:
Returns a paginated response including settlements for the given invoice.

Requires the claims_reader role to access.

post.description:
Add a settlement into an invoice.

Requires the claims_writer role to access.

get.summary: Get a settlement on an invoice
get.description:
Fetch a single settlement on an invoice.

Requires the claims_reader role to access.

delete.description:
Remove a settlement from an invoice.

Requires the claims_writer role to access.

get.summary: Get a recovery on an invoice
get.description:
Fetch a single recovery on an invoice.

Requires the claims_reader role to access.

delete.summary: Remove a recovery from an invoice
delete.description:
Removes a recovery from an invoice.

Requires the claims_writer role for access.

get.description:
Get a paginated list of all recoveries on an invoice.

Requires the claims_reader role to access.

post.description:
Adds a recovery into an invoice.

Requires the claims_writer role to access.

approved.description: Cannot be true at the same time as rejected.

rejected.description: Cannot be true at the same time as approved.
